last_episode_to_air.name: The Genius of Beethoven
last_episode_to_air.overview: Beethoven is a three-part BBC dramatized documentary series (1. The Rebel; 2. Love and Loss; 3. Faith and Fury) presented by the conductor Charles Hazlewood, taking a look at the life and work of Ludwig van Beethoven.

name: The Genius of Beethoven
overview: Beethoven is a three-part BBC dramatized documentary series (1. The Rebel; 2. Love and Loss; 3. Faith and Fury) presented by the conductor Charles Hazlewood, taking a look at the life and work of Ludwig van Beethoven.
